messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] photos of people in this group
messages.msgSnippet: ... I just uploaded a pic. taken at the Homeschool Association of California Sacramento conference in 1999.  I am short, and my hair is short, but my glasses
messages.messageBody:
on 4/17/02 8:00 AM, The Mowery Family at jkkddmowery@... wrote:

>
> Nancy W. with short red hair and glasses

I just uploaded a pic. taken at the Homeschool Association of California
Sacramento conference in 1999. I am short, and my hair is short, but my
glasses are contacts most of the time. Red? well, I have *thought* about
it... (I can't remember who's arm is making the devil horns on my head)

Nancy

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] photos of people in this group
messages.msgSnippet: Elissa, you d better have short blond curlyish hair :0). ~Rue Well, I think I did at one time but I currently have medium long dark brown hair, straight. But
messages.messageBody:
Elissa, you'd better have short blond curlyish hair :0).
~Rue

Well, I think I did at one time but I currently have medium long dark brown
hair, straight.
But just wait!! That may change!!



~Elissa Cleaveland
"It is nothing short of a miracle that the modern methods of instruction
have
not yet entirely strangled the holy curiosity of inquiry." A. Einstein

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] photos of people in this group
messages.msgSnippet: ... It isn t, is it? Goodness, it is. I just looked at the pictures I took. I was remembering a bit darker than mine and I think of mine as dark blonde. (It s
messages.messageBody:
on 4/17/02 1:11 PM, SandraDodd@... at SandraDodd@... wrote:

> long dark brown hair with more and more grey...

It isn't, is it?

Goodness, it is. I just looked at the pictures I took. I was remembering a
bit darker than mine and I think of mine as dark blonde. (It's the same
color as a used penny. :-) It looks a tad reddish in the picture which it
isn't at all.)

Joyce

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] photos of people in this group
messages.msgSnippet: on 4/17/02 7:40 AM, ElissaJC@concentric.net at ElissaJC@concentric.net ... if anyone wants to see AnneO, there s a (tiny) photo of her (and me and Sandra) at
messages.messageBody:
on 4/17/02 7:40 AM, ElissaJC@... at ElissaJC@...
wrote:

> AnneO has really long hair, light brown and very shiny and she wears lots of
> purple and beads

if anyone wants to see AnneO, there's a (tiny) photo of her (and me and
Sandra) at the webpage for the South Carolina conference:

http://www.schoolsoutsupport.org/speakers.html

(The light brown is the only part that's right. Her hair *couldn't* be much
shorter ;-)

Joyce

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] photos of people in this group
messages.msgSnippet: More people have long brown hair than you guys think, I think! Sharon s hair is like my husband s kind of.  He has a braid and the braid is still kinda blond,
messages.messageBody:
More people have long brown hair than you guys think, I think!

Sharon's hair is like my husband's kind of. He has a braid and the braid is
still kinda blond, but the hair on his head is all grey and white.

Pam has long blonde hair.

Sandra,
long dark brown hair with more and more grey...

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] photos of people in this group
messages.msgSnippet: Well, except for the wavy part you pretty much have me right.  Except that by conference I should have all my hair hacked off again to very-short. Pam, done
messages.messageBody:
Well, except for the wavy part you pretty much have me right. <g> Except
that by conference I should have all my hair hacked off again to very-short.

Pam, done with her "let's have long hair!" madness of last year...

----------
From: "The Mowery Family" <jkkddmowery@...>
To: <AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com>

Pam H. with brown hair, shoulder length, kinda wavy and tucked behind her

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] photos of people in this group
messages.msgSnippet: Barbie?  Is that you??  lol ... I pictured Joyce petite with dark blonde bob Pam H. with brown hair, shoulder length, kinda wavy and tucked behind her ears
messages.messageBody:
Barbie? Is that you?? lol

> I am 5'8'' 115 lbs with HUGE boobs, a tiny butt with no cellulite or
> stretchmarks and can walk in high heels for hours
> NOT!

I pictured Joyce petite with dark blonde bob

Pam H. with brown hair, shoulder length, kinda wavy and tucked behind her
ears

Nancy W. with short red hair and glasses

Tia with short dark hair with highlights, trendy glasses, cool clothes and
petite

Tuck, with southern hair(not big but coiffed) about medium height and in
khakis

Me? I still think I am in my early twenties, sunkissed with color, not
thin - but just right - then I look in the mirror and don't recognize
myself. I want to know the aging alien that took over my body.

sistakammi

messages.subject: RE: [AlwaysLearning] photos of people in this group
messages.msgSnippet: I ve realized that I mostly picture people by hairstyle!  I don t know why. Joyce, you re supposed to have blond hair, Pam S. should have straight, shoulder
messages.messageBody:
I've realized that I mostly picture people by hairstyle! I don't know why.
Joyce, you're supposed to have blond hair, Pam S. should have straight,
shoulder length black hair, and zenmomma shouldn't have bangs. Ren looks
just right, and Elissa, you'd better have short blond curlyish hair :0).
~Rue




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] photos of people in this group
messages.msgSnippet: OH! I forgot Tia! I can t tell what she looks like because she is wearing a full length parka because she is in canada which every american  knows is like
messages.messageBody:
OH! I forgot Tia!
I can't tell what she looks like because she is wearing a full length parka
because she is in canada which every american knows is like Siberia!
~Elissa Cleaveland
"It is nothing short of a miracle that the modern methods of instruction
have
not yet entirely strangled the holy curiosity of inquiry." A. Einstein

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] photos of people in this group
messages.msgSnippet: Betty White? NO Way! Joyce is short, about 5 3 with very dark hair pulled back low on her neck Sandra I ve seen so I can t describe her. AnneO has really
messages.messageBody:
Betty White? NO Way!
Joyce is short, about 5'3'' with very dark hair pulled back low on her neck
Sandra I've seen so I can't describe her.
AnneO has really long hair, light brown and very shiny and she wears lots of
purple and beads
Helen has short wavy blond hair, thick, and tucked back over her ears. She
has a very no nonsense look about her.
Pam has very blonde hair and fair skin to make a beautiful contrast with her
husband
I am 5'8'' 115 lbs with HUGE boobs, a tiny butt with no cellulite or
stretchmarks and can walk in high heels for hours
NOT!
~Elissa Cleaveland
"It is nothing short of a miracle that the modern methods of instruction
have
not yet entirely strangled the holy curiosity of inquiry." A. Einstein

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] photos of people in this group
messages.msgSnippet: ... I don t think I ve guessed right about anyone yet! With my record, the clearer the picture I have of someone, the more likely they ll turn out the opposite
messages.messageBody:
on 4/16/02 8:18 PM, Jon and Rue Kream at skreams@... wrote:

> Pam S., Joyce and Zenmomma Mary - you've been miscast! ~Rue

:-)

I don't think I've guessed right about anyone yet! With my record, the
clearer the picture I have of someone, the more likely they'll turn out the
opposite of what I imagine. I "knew" that Sandra was tall and blond and
willowy and Pam would be dark to go with her last name. ;-) Someone said
they pictured me looking like Betty White! :-)

Joyce

messages.subject: RE: [AlwaysLearning] photos of people in this group
messages.msgSnippet: You know when you read a book and then you go see the movie and you get mad at the casting director for choosing people that don t look right to you??? Pam S.,
messages.messageBody:
You know when you read a book and then you go see the movie and you get mad
at the casting director for choosing people that don't look right to you???
Pam S., Joyce and Zenmomma Mary - you've been miscast! ~Rue
-----Original Message-----
From: SandraDodd@... [mailto:SandraDodd@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 16, 2002 7:06 PM
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [AlwaysLearning] photos of people in this group


Either people have sneaked some photos into the archives, or I missed some
announcements. If the latter, I'm really sorry!! They're great pictures of
cool people, too. Look when you get a chance. You go to this group's
website at
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/AlwaysLearning/
and click on "photos."

I got to meet Lexie a week ago in Long Beach, and I saw two pictures of her
today (which mean so much more now that I have a height and eye-flash and
voice to add to them!)

*Tomorrow* Mary/Zenmomma's coming to see us, with Conor and Cacey, so I was
going to show Holly photos of them, and there were more photos of them than
I
thought!!

Sandra
